data.title: Choose the correct answer for each question

sections.explain: Subject: The coffee. Verb: is. Complement (Adjective): hot.
Subject: She. Verb: gave. Indirect Object: her brother. Direct Object: a new book (with adjective new).

words.word: She gave her brother a new book.
She gave a new book her brother.
A new book gave she to her brother.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: SV Word Order with Adverb.
sections.explain: Subject: They. Verb: walk. Adverb: slowly.
Subject: The cat. Verb: caught. Object: the mouse.
Subject: The children. Verb: are. Complement: happy.
Subject: I. Verb: sent. Indirect Object: my friend. Direct Object: a message.

words.word: I sent my friend a message.
I sent a message my friend.
My friend I a message sent.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: SV Word Order with Adverb.
sections.explain: Subject: He. Verb: speaks. Adverb: clearly.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: SVO Word Order with Adjective.
sections.explain: Subject: The girl. Verb: read. Object: an interesting book (with adjective interesting).

words.word: The girl read an interesting book.
An interesting book read the girl.

sections.explain: Subject: The weather. Verb: was. Complement: cold.

sections.summary: Teaching Focus: SVO Word Order with Adverb.
sections.explain: Subject: She. Verb: finished. Object: the test. Adverb: quickly.
